decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings: Proposed Site Plan drawing no.21-007-P02A, Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no.21-007-P03A, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing no.21-007-P04A, Proposed Roof Floor Plan drawing no.21-007-P05A, Proposed Front Elevation (north facing) drawing no.21-007-P07, Proposed Rear Elevation (south facing) drawing no.21-007-P08A, Proposed Side Elevation (west facing) drawing  no.21-007-P09A and Proposed context elevation drawing no.21-007-P10A

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall complement the appearance of those of the existing property and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - Section 12, policy D3 London Plan 2021, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
| No new openings to the extension hereby approved shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - secton 12, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 , 2.1, 3.1(b) and 3.8 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
| The proposed side roof extension shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level and remain in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1 and D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
description: Part two storey side/rear (wrap around) extension (following demolition of existing outbuilding),front porch extension and side/rear roof extensions
